title: Smart Data Models - ITinfrastructure / InfrastructureElementRequirements
description: Computing requirements that must accomplish an InfrastructureElement to run a certain ServiceComponent on it.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be InfrastructureElementRequirements

infrastructureElement.description: Relationship. Only if an specific InfrastructureElement has been selected to run the component.

cpuArchitecture.description: Property. Enum:'AMD64', 'ARM64', 'ARM32', 'MIPS64LE', 'PPC64LE', 'RISC-V', 'S390X'. CPU architecture that must have the Infrastructure Element.

diskType.description: Property. Enum:'HDD', 'SSD'. Disk type that must have the Infrastructure Element.

gpu.description: Property. Defines if the Infrastructure Element must have a GPU.

realTimeCapable.description: Property. Defines if the Infrastructure Element must be capable of real-time processing.

requiredCpuUsage.description: Property. Units:'CPU cores'. Required CPU usage of the component.

requiredMemoryUsage.description: Property. Units:'Megabytes (MB)'. Required memory usage of the component.

greenEnergyRatio.description: Property. Ratio (between 0 and 1) of green energy that must use the power source that feeds the Infrastructure Element.

energyEfficiencyRatio.description: Property. Energy efficiency ratio (between 0 and 1) that must have the Infrastructure Element.
